title: Client keeps crashing after every game, 5.23
body:
After every game i have played today, my client has been crashing as soon as I click the "Continue" button under the Victory/Defeat banner. My game wont pop back up again and will crash with no warning or anything.
It may not seem like much but its been doing this for a week now and it is getting on my nerves.
I have also used the Repair in the patcher and now it just crashes when it sits there. I opened it at the start of writing this and it has crashed by the time i've written this sentence.

Would love some help <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hey ShardAura,

You may want to try the solutions provided in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article!
